documents.document: You can watch the 🌟Mind Media Awards🌟 live tonight on Facebook, follow link ⬇️ for info. A great celebration of responsible & positive media around mental illness and mental health #VMGMindAwards @MindCharity https://t.co/1yMVLLWzSe

RT @MindCharity: Tonight's the night! 📺📸📻🎙️
Ahead of tonight’s event, Julia from our media team blogs about why the Mind Media Awards are…

“Get the violent crazies off our streets”
🤦🏻‍♀️The media is so powerful to ⬆️or⬇️ #stigma
Positive & helpful stories, articles & info about #mentalhealth is v. important to raise awareness
Tonight we’re celebrating this at the @MindCharity 🌟Mind Media Awards🌟
#VMGMindAwards https://t.co/YXToFmLvhm

#NewYearsEve treat at the Hope Centre orphanage in #Ghana... watching #ToyStory together on my iPad.
Lots of fun & laughter with our beautiful children ❤️🇬🇭 Its wonderful being here #NYE https://t.co/6DgAg0Yy8P
@BrianwDolan @kennygibsonnhs 🤗🤗🤗
@Vickynhs You are very welcome... I go 3-4 times a year; it’s so good for the soul. #Ghana is full of love, laughter & the warmest welcome 🇬🇭❤️ send me a message if you’d like to come xx
@edetcher 😂😂😂 the handles on both my #ghanamustgo bags snapped whilst I was still in London 🤦🏻‍♀️🙄
@BrianwDolan Ahh thanks @BrianwDolan 🤗 please accept an open invitation to come with me to Ghana anytime. It’s such a wonderful country... and the Hope Centre orphanage is just amazing ❤️🇬🇭
@joan_myers Thank you kindly @joan_myers
@jimgblair @cisanim Thank you 😊

The only way to eat ice-cream in #Ghana 🇬🇭❤️ if you know, you know!
Heading west to the orphanage today; it’s going to be an exciting evening 🤶🏻 Thanks for all your good wishes, much appreciated 🤗 https://t.co/YTWOfl0ooa

Each child gets a new school bag, a reading book, drawing book & pencil case, wash kit, sweets, toys and a new pair of Jim-jams... with 28 children & babies at the orphanage I’m so far over my baggage allowance it’s not funny, thanks to the generosity of my friends & family ❤️

I’m so excited to be heading to #Ghana today with (slightly late) Christmas gifts from 28 of my friends in the UK to the 28 kiddies at the Hope Centre orphanage. Its such a massive pleasure playing Santa every year 🤶🏻❤️🇬🇭 it also means I get hundreds of hugs& kisses to bring back https://t.co/fpSK6rCCY7

@kennygibsonnhs I love this @kennygibsonnhs thanks for sharing 😊
